mapper.update: update proxy set block_timeout = date_add(current_timestamp ,interval minute block_interval), block_count =0 where block_timeout < current_timestamp
mapper.select: select * from proxy p where p.enable_status =1 and p.block_timeout < current_timestamp and p.available_status=1 and (p.current_use_count < p.max_use_count) and p.ip not in ( select ip from site_ip_block_map m where m.site_id = #{siteId} and m .block_timeout >current_timestamp ) and p.ip not in( select ip from site_ip_delay_map m where m.site_id = #{siteId} and m .delay_timeout > current_timestamp ) order by (p.current_use_count / p.max_use_count) asc limit 1,1
